definition: jejunum (empty gut, middle segment of small intestine between duodenum 十二指腸|十二指肠[shi2 er4 zhi3 chang2] and ileum 回腸|回肠[hui2 chang2])

sentences.english: To explore the nursing ways of enteral nutrition therapy per stoma of jejunum after total gastrectomy.
sentences.chinese: 探討全胃切除術後空腸造口腸內營養治療的護理方法。

sentences.english: The atonomosis meshs density of the jejunum was larger than the ileums.
sentences.chinese: 空腸器官表面動脈吻合網面密度大於迴腸。

sentences.english: Location of efferent neurons of caecum in fowl;
sentences.chinese: 探討白朮對雞離體空腸和盲腸運動張力的影響。

sentences.english: The experimental Alkaline Reflux Gastritis in rats was established after 9 weeks of anastomosis between stomach and jejunum.
sentences.chinese: 大鼠胃空腸吻合9周後，形成實驗性返流性胃炎。

sentences.english: The two ends of the jejunum segment were anastomosed separately to the cervical esophagus and the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 空腸段上下兩斷端分別與頸部食管及胃吻合代食管。

sentences.english: Campylobacter jejuni is recognized as one of the major causes of human food-borne diseases.
sentences.chinese: 空腸彎曲菌是引起人類食源性疾病的主要病原菌之一。

sentences.english: Scintigraphy with Technetium-labeled red blood cells showed jejunal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 同位素紅血球掃描發現空腸處出血。

sentences.english: The first choice of reconstructive strategy for hypopharyngeal circumferential defects is free jejunal interposition.
sentences.chinese: 建議下嚥環周缺損重建首選遊離空腸移植術。

sentences.english: The correct jejunal position was documented by the application of a radiopaque contrast medium through the tube.
sentences.chinese: 通過導管注入造影劑以標記正確的空腸位置。

sentences.english: Reconstruction of the pharyngoesophagus with free jejunal transfer has become the standard technique.
sentences.chinese: 使用自由空腸皮瓣已成爲咽食道重建之標準方式。

sentences.english: The research aimed to discuss the effect of atractylodes macrocephala on the tension of isolated jejunum and caecum of chook.
sentences.chinese: 探討白朮對雞離體空腸和盲腸運動張力的影響。
